segments.text: I see the water pooling under the sink, glistening uninvitingly on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s dangerous; someone is bound to slip, and the thought makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, blissfully unaware as she dries another dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration seems so admirable, yet so misplaced at this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are wrapped up in their cookie theft, oblivious to the risks as well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a mix of admiration and dread at their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how quickly fun can turn into disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
